name: DOC_LINKED_PAT_CSNS
description: Linked patient contact serial numbers for EHI Export.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The list of patient contact serial numbers that this DCS is associated with for Electronic Health Information (EHI) Export
